Introduction
This topic contains information on employment-related development in IU claims, including
employment history requirements in IU claims
action to take based on employment history provided
requesting employment information from employers
, and
self-employment development
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 3, Section B - Individual Unemployability (IU) Claims Development
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 3, Section B
